annotations.description:
Provides a PostgreSQL database on RHEL. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/blob/master/README.md.

WARNING: By selecting this tag, your application will automatically update to use the latest version of PostgreSQL available on OpenShift, including major version updates.

Provides a PostgreSQL 12 database on RHEL 8. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/blob/master/README.md.

Provides a PostgreSQL 12 database on RHEL 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/blob/master/README.md.

Provides a PostgreSQL 12 database on RHEL 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/blob/master/README.md.

Provides a PostgreSQL 10 database on RHEL 8. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/blob/master/README.md.

Provides a PostgreSQL 9.6 database on RHEL 8. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/postgresql-container/blob/master/README.md.
